alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Floyd; Johnson; Magoffin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 2:34PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Johnson, northwestern Floyd, northeastern Breathitt and central Magoffin Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 234 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hendricks, or near Salyersville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Salyersville, Mason and Lakesville around 245 PM EDT. Conley Station, Sublett, Skaggs, West Royalton Station, Royalton, Carver, Carver Station, Tiptop and Burning Fork around 250 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Swampton, Marshallville, Bradley, Ivyton, Duco, Gypsy, Waldo, Gapville, Fredville, Ordway, Riceville, Brainard, Orchard, Gunlock, Dotson and Bonanza. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
